sense.gloss: to get dirty, to become dirty
to become sullied, to become corrupted, to lose one's chastity

sdata.j: 「↑服|↑↓ふく↓↑汚↑↓けが↓れる|でしょ」「それはノープロブレム。もともとあんまり↑綺麗↑↓きれい↓じゃないし」
sdata.e: You'll get your clothes dirty. "No worries. They weren't very clean in the first place."

sdata.j: ↑服↑↓ふく↓が|↑汚↑↓よご↓れる|のは↑嫌↑↓いや↓だな。
sdata.e: I don't want to get my clothes dirty.
